characterList: 古胡吾朋明唱晶品昌早旭世胃旦凹凸

characters.story: The stone takes the shape of ancient, calling out "Gu" - a vivid image to remember!
A reckless fool with wild whiskers asks "Who? Hu?" questioning everything!
"I," says the mouth, questioning "Wu? Am I important?" with a sigh!
Two moons ask "Peng? Why are we companions?" questioning their friendship!
The sun and moon together question "Ming? Why so bright?" curiously!
With your mouth, you command the sun to sing "Chang!" sharply!
Three suns sparkle cheerfully, singing "Jing!" high and happy!
Three mouths bend down, drooping as they inspect goods saying "Pin"!
Two suns rise high, singing "Chang!" to celebrate prosperity!
The morning sun still hangs low at dawn's early hour, yawning "Zao"!
See how the sun forms rising sun? It shouts "Shu!" sharply as sunlight streams across the sky!
Three tens stack up, yelling "Shi!" for each generation sharply!
Your stomach with a field inside yells "Way!" angrily when hungry!
At daybreak, the sun commands "Dan!" sharply above the horizon!
The strokes unite to show concave, singing "Aaooo!" cheerfully!
The stick stands for convex, singing "Too!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
